Attacks.Name: Hydro Cannon
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character is pushed away L distance from Mega Blastoise and gains the Soaked special condition.

Attacks.Name: Aqua Jet
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Mega Blastoise may make an immediate move action. During this move, it can move through characters without penalty.

Attacks.Name: Water Spout
Attacks.Effect: This attack deals damage to all characters (friend and foe) within range 2 of the target character. If a wild is rolled, affected characters also gain the Soaked special condition.

Attacks.Name: Aura Sphere
Attacks.Effect: This attack ignores line of sight and cover. If a wild is rolled, this attack deals 2 additional damage.

Superpowers.Name: Mega Launcher
Superpowers.Effect: When this character uses an attack with 'Cannon', 'Pulse', 'Sphere', or 'Aura' in its name, add 1 die to the attack roll.

Superpowers.Name: Torrential Shell
Superpowers.Effect: For the rest of the turn, add 3 dice to Mega Blastoise's defense rolls and gain 2 power. This superpower can be used only once per turn.

Superpowers.Name: Rapid Spin
Superpowers.Effect: Remove all special conditions from Mega Blastoise and make an immediate move action. During this move, it can move through terrain without penalty.

Attacks.Name: Skull Bash
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character gains the Stun special condition and is pushed away M distance.

Superpowers.Name: Shell Fortress
Superpowers.Effect: Mega Blastoise gains the Impenetrable Shell special condition, reducing damage from all attacks by 2 and gaining immunity to the Stun and Freeze conditions for the rest of the game. This superpower can be used only once per game.

Superpowers.Name: Mega Launcher
Superpowers.Effect: When this character uses an attack with 'Cannon', 'Pulse', 'Sphere', or 'Aura' in its name, add 1 die to the attack roll.
